title: JIT VM Error report. Consensus issues.
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `Dao relese`
OS & Version: Windows
Commit hash : (if `develop`)
#### Expected behaviour

Syncs
#### Actual behaviour

Consensus error
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Started with empty database hour before the fork. Stoped syncy an hour after. Restarted bus issue persists. Geth told me to report it somewhere so here I am.
#### Backtrace

```
[backtrace]
```

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.10586](c) 2015 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

\Desktop\geth.exe --support-dao-fork
I0721 01:09:36.208644 cmd/utils/flags.go:678] You're one of the lucky few that will try out the JIT VM (random). If you get a consensus failure please be so kind to report this incident with the block hash that failed. You can switch to the regular VM by setting --jitvm=false
